title: The Federal Reserve�s Review of Its Monetary Policy Strategy, Tools, and Communication Practices
content: For release on delivery  6:45 p.m. EDT (5:45 p.m. CDT)  April 9, 2019      The Federal Reserve’s Review of Its Monetary Policy Strategy, Tools, and  Communication Practices    Remarks by     Richard H. Clarida     Vice Chair     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     “Fed Listens:  Distributional Consequences of the Cycle and Monetary Policy”  Conference hosted by the Opportunity and Inclusive Growth Institute   Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis     Minneapolis, Minnesota                 April 9, 2019
